alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 03 at 2:53AM EDT until May 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HIGH FIRE DANGER EXPECTED ACROSS NORTHERN EAST CENTRAL FLORIDA WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND BREEZY CONDITIONS ACROSS NORTHERN EAST CENTRAL FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Volusia, Lake, Seminole, Orange, Brevard, and Osceola counties. * WINDS...West 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum values of 25 to 35 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new or existing fires will be capable of rapid spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
